product_name: Camaro Ultradry Rashguard T-Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Keep from getting burned-or chilled-on the water in the women's Camaro Ultradry Rashguard T-Shirt. It offers UPF 50+ sun protection and dries super fast to keep you warm and having fun. Lightweigh nylon and spandex fabric is super stretchy for easy movement and dries quickly. The women's short-sleeve Camaro Ultradry Rashguard T-Shirt offers excellent UPF 50+ sun protection.
short_description: Keep from getting burned-or chilled-on the water in the women's Camaro Ultradry Rashguard T-Shirt. It offers UPF 50+ sun protection and dries super fast to keep you warm and having fun.
